resources.string: There was an error logging off, please try again later
Botia will be disabled for customer.
Botia will not answer automatically for this customer until you enable it again.
Botia app needs this permission to show notifications, if allowed, you are going to receive notifications when a customer needs personal assistance or any other important events.

You opted not to get notifications, we encourage you to allow notifications to get Botia full potential, like being notified when a customer needs personal assistance. Click ok button to go to notifications settings.
